page.title: 16LOCAL EVENTS - 1985
page.content: BISHAMPTONS PATRONAL FESTIVAL WEEK-END On Saturday July 13th - one of the sunniest days of this years summer - A good crowd greeted Mr and Mrs Ogle who performed the opening ceremony of Bishampton's Garden Party. They also judged the craft competition in church and drew the Grand Draw. There were many stalls and sideshows in the vicarage garden. Beautiful floral arrangements filled the church. Entertainment was provided by Eckington Junior Handbell Ringers and the village children displayed their various talents, dancing, flute and clarinet playing, gymnastic routine, and singing. There was a Family Communion service on Sunday morning and in the evening "Musyck Anon" presented a programme of "Music and Prose for a Summer Evening" The weekend raised Â£747.
